title: David Bowie: serious moonlight
creator_credit: David Mallet, Anthony Eaton and Concert Productions International
brief_description: Filmed live performance of David Bowie on his 1983 Serious Moonlight World Tour at the P.N.E. Grandstand, Vancouver, British Columbia. Highly regarded and world renowned rock performer/entertainer, David Bowie sings his way through some of his most popular classics.
